original_text: As it is, you are looking for a way to kill me, a man who has told you the truth that I heard from God. Abraham did not do such things.
korean_text: 지금 하나님께 들은 진리를 너희에게 말한 사람인 나를 죽이려 하는도다 아브라함은 이렇게 하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: you are looking for a way to kill me,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나를 죽일 방법을 찾고 있으며,

sentences.original_text: a man who has told you the truth
Abraham did not do such things.
